With marking a thread as spam three events occur:
An event of the creator of the thread got blocked.
An event for leaving the thread.
An event that mentions that the content of the thread was deleted.

If you have a
access for this thread you could completely delete the thread.
Following things will happen if you delete a thread:
All members are deleted from the channel or group and will receive a message about it.
All members of the thread will receive a message that contains who deleted the thread.

abstract.text: With Chat SDK you could connect to the chat server without managing the socket state and send or receive messages.

Get thread participants.

For creating, add/remove command, user bots, start/stop.

You could manage download and upload and so more in terms of working with files.

You could Add, delete, edit, reply, forward and so many more.
Get current user details, update, set profile.
Tags are like folder for managing threads. You could Add, delete, edit and add/remove tag participans.
Manage users such as get a list of roles and so more.
